需要将设备返回该用户的序列号与秘钥保存起来。当通过蓝牙连接更新用户资料或用户通过蓝牙连接测量时，需要先使用用户序列号与秘钥访问秤端的指定用户成功后才能进行。同时序列号也是作为设备上传测量数据属于哪个注册用户的标识，以及作为删除用户的必要条件。

sdk中的算法机制通常为统一的某种算法，不可变的。也就是说，同一个秤使用我司的app测量与使用sdk进行测量，计算资料和体重一样，也有可能有会不少的差异。所以，我司不建议使用我司app和sdk的测量数据进行对比，客户只需要关心给到的算法是否合适，是否稳定即可。

sdk是否为离线的？它会向yolanda云端发送什么数据？
sdk是否可以只做协议解析，蓝牙扫描和连接由客户自己管理
sdk是支持离线模式的，客户如果特别要求，我们会把配置文件中关于该项的配置设置成离线。设置成离线后，sdk不再向外发送任何网络请求（这个可以用抓包工具验证）配置文件不再更新，如果需要增加型号或指标，则需要跟我司再次申请配置文件，然后由开发人员手动替换。
sdk的运行需要appid以及配置文件，商家在接入时可先使用yolanda提供的测试appid和测试配置文件，正式发布时必须向yolanda官方获取正式appid和配置文件

广播秤是一款无需连接，通过接收设备发出的广播获取相关数据的设备。该秤与普通蓝牙秤不同，区别在于普通蓝牙秤在扫描到周围的设备信息时，可以发起对周围某一设备的连接，从而可以选择是否停止扫描周围的设备信息，而不影响从已连接设备中获取相关的测量信息。

guide/ios.html.title: ios
guide/ios.html.body:
iOS Quick Integration
The operation of the SDK requires appid and configuration files. Merchants can first use the test appid and test configuration files provided by Lightniu. When they are officially released, they must obtain the official appid and configuration files from Lightniu official.
Installation method
cocoapods installation:

Install Cocoapods first；
Update the cocoapods version of QNSDK via pod repo update；
In the target corresponding to Podfile, add pod'QNSDK', And execute pod install；
Run the project using .xcworkspace generated by CocoaPods in the project；
Include the header file #import in your code file header

Carthage installation:

Install Carthage；
Open Cartfile, add github" https://github.com/YolandaQingniu/sdk-ios-demo.git"；
Open the command line, cd to your project directory, enter carthage update；
Drag QNSDK.framework in the Carthage/Build/directory to the Build Phases of your project engineering configuration->Linked Binary and Libraries；
Include the header file #import in your code file header

Manual installation:

Download the SDK installation package to the project
Introduce SDK path【TARGETS】-> 【Build Setting】->【Search Paths】->【LibrarySearch Paths】Add SDK path
Configure linker【TARGETS】-> 【Build Setting】-> 【Linking】-> 【Other Linker Flags】Add -ObjC、-all_load、-force_load [SDK path] one of them

Project configuration

Yes in Info.plist【Privacy - Bluetooth Peripheral Usage Description】【Privacy - Bluetooth Always Usage Description】Key for instructions on using Bluetooth

Precautions

SDK compatible with 8.0 and above systems
iOS10.0 and above systems must be equipped with Bluetooth instructions in Info.plist, otherwise the Bluetooth function of the system cannot be used
iOS13.0 and above systems must be configured with Bluetooth license instructions in Info.plist, otherwise it will find crash
The linker must be configured for the SDK, otherwise the SDK will not run properly

flow/flow_dm.html.body:
Dual mode scale access guide
Introduction
The "dual-mode scale" mentioned here refers to a body fat scale with two data transmission functions: WiFi and Bluetooth
Function
Bluetooth
Set the ssid and password for WiFi
Data transfer for weighing
WiFi
Weighing data transmission
WiFi usage process
first time using
When using for the first time
1. Scanning device
Call the API of the ordinary Bluetooth scale, scan the Bluetooth device (QNBleDevice), and determine whether the value of isSupportWifi is true. If true, the Wifi function is supported.
2. Register Device
The WiFi device needs to register with the server and call the API register WiFi dual-mode device with Qingniu Cloud

This method requires a network, please ensure that the method is successfully executed, otherwise the cloud cannot receive the measurement data forwarded by our cloud
The method can be successfully executed once, but it has no adverse effects multiple times.

3. Configure WiFi
The WiFi ssid and password are not saved at the scale end when leaving the factory. At this time, you need to call the relevant APP of Bluetooth to configure the scale end.

Networking API Please see Networking for WiFi Bluetooth Dual Mode Device

4. Writing network interfaces
Provide the address prefix of the client's cloud server, such as: http://www.baidu.com/scale/

We collectively refer to our company's servers as:Light Cow Cloud, the customer's server is: Merchant Cloud

Ask user profile interface
Scenes
Preconditions: The scale has been successfully registered, the scale has been configured with the network, and Bluetooth is not connected during the measurement.
At this time, the data will be uploaded to the light cow cloud via WiFi, and then the light cow cloud will forward the relevant information such as weight and measurement time to the merchant cloud.
At this time, the merchant cloud needs to query the user who is bound to the device in the service, and return the user information to the light cow cloud, and then the light cow combines the user data to calculate and then pass the data through Push Measurement Data Service.
Basic
Interface address: prefix + user_info, example: address is http://www.baidu.com/accept/user_info where user_info is appended to the provided interface address prefix
Request method: GET

Normally, the response will not be sent again after success, and it will not be sent again in the case of failure.

Push measurement data service
Scenes
After receiving the user data returned by Merchant Cloud, Qingniu Cloud will calculate the fitness data, and then push the data to Merchant Cloud through this interface
Basic
Interface address: prefix + measure, example: address is http://www.baidu.com/accept/measure where measure is appended to the provided interface address prefix
Request method: POST

During the notification interaction, if Light Cow received a response from the partner that was not successful or timed out, Light Cow thought that the notification failed, and Light Cow would periodically re-initiate the notification through a certain strategy to maximize the success rate of the notification, but Light Cow does not guarantee the notification. Finally succeed. (Notification frequency is 15/30/180/1800/3600, unit: second)
In addition, in general, the response will not be sent again after a successful response. In the case of failure, the same notification may be sent to the partner system multiple times. Partner systems must be able to handle duplicate notifications correctly.

}
Return parameters
Just return success/fail
Signature Algorithm
The data interaction between Light Cow and the partner system will be digitally signed.At present, only the MD5 method is supported. When signing, you need to use the secret assigned when you enter Light Cow (a pair of partner_id/secret will be assigned when you enter Light Cow.
secret is used for signature, please keep the key assigned by Qingniu properly)
Parameters involved in signing: In the light cattle request parameter list, except for the sign parameter, the other parameters that need to be used are the parameters to be signed.
The steps for signature generation are as follows:

Put these parameters in a Map and remove the signature parameters:sign
Sort the remaining parameters in ascending order of key (order from a to z, if the same first letter is encountered, see the second letter, and so on)
After sorting is complete, press key&The value key-value pair format is concatenated into a string stringA, removing data where value is empty.
Combine the above string with the secret allocated on the back to form a new string
Use MD5 to sign the assembled string and verify that the signature is the sign in the parameter.

Pay special attention to the following important rules:

If the parameter value is empty, do not participate in signature；
When verifying the return of the call or proactively notifying the signature, the sign parameter transmitted does not participate in the signature, and the generated signature is checked against the sign value.
Light cattle interface may add fields, and the extended fields must be supported when verifying signatures

Example:
Requested parameters:
{
  "partner_id": "1111",
  "user_code": "921026",
  "nonce_str": "11eeewwwwwq112s",
  "sign": "a328c2ec0a60cbbc9961a1189f61e97b"
}

splice:
stringA = “nonce_str=11eeewwwwwq112s&partner_id=1111&user_code=921026”
Splicing on the secret: after ekskdsd8sd88s833 "nonce_str = 11eeewwwwwq112s&partner_id=1111&user_code=921026ekskd sd8sd88s833"
MD5 signature value:
a328c2ec0a60cbbc9961a1189f61e97b
During daily use
WIFI data interaction timing diagram
Normal measurement process
as follows:



After the user measures on the scale, the data will be sent to the light cow cloud first
According to Register Device Method, Light Cow Cloud judges that the device belongs to the customer, and then forwards the data to the cloud address that the customer has filled in.
The customer cloud tries to determine the owner of the device according to the previous relationship between the device and the user. If it is determined, it returns the user's information to Qingniu Cloud.
Qingniu Cloud received the user data returned by the customer cloud, combined with the data at the scale end, to calculate the complete measurement data.
Light Cow Cloud pushes complete measurement data to the customer cloud.
The customer cloud pushes the measurement data to the APP and displays the measurement data to the customer.

Matching to multi-user measurements
Among the above steps, in step 3, it may find that the measurement user fails, and the following situations occur:

No users are bound to this device
In this case, the measurement data can be directly discarded to play the seven cow cloud, and the data is not matched.
Multiple users are bound to the device at the same time, or multiple users are using the device at the same time. It is impossible to determine which user is using the scale, you can refer to the figure below, the user identification scheme adopted in our own APP.



If a user can be uniquely identified through the scheme in the figure above, proceed according to the normal measurement process. If multiple users are still identified, refer to the following process.




The method mentioned in the above picture that calls the SDK to generate complete measurement data is: QNScaleStoreData.buildStoreData
The sign in the query user profile interface also needs to be saved and sent to the APP, which is used to call the SDK production measurement data.

api/QNBleApi.html.body:
QNBleApi
Entrance class
Method
initSdk
Initialize the SDK according to appid and verify the appid and configuration file. This method also loads the relevant configuration in the configuration file.
This method only needs to be called once, not multiple times. Android is recommended to be called in Application.onCreate, and iOS is to be called in didFinishLaunchingWithOptions under AppDelegate. This method only performs lightweight operations, time-consuming operations are performed asynchronously, and it does not affect the startup speed of the APP.
Under normal circumstances, this method will send a request to our server to update the configuration in the configuration file, such as updating algorithms, updating indicators, adding new models, etc. This can achieve the effect of online upgrade configuration. If you do not want to have this feature, you can turn off the function (that is, the SDK is changed to offline mode) by communicating with our company. In addition, if there is no network, there will be no impact after the request fails, and the SDK will continue to use the previous configuration.

Note: The 123456789 appid in the demo is the test id. The test id has instability and random variability. After the access provider and Lightniow reach an agreement, they can obtain independent and stable appids. Remember that the test Id cannot be used in the online application market

api/QNBleBroadcastDevice.html.title: QNBleBroadcastDevice
api/QNBleBroadcastDevice.html.body:
QNBleBroadcastDevice
Light Bull Radio Scale Bluetooth Device Object
The broadcast scale is a device that does not need to be connected to obtain relevant data through the broadcast from the receiving device. This scale is different from the ordinary Bluetooth scale, the difference is that when the ordinary Bluetooth scale scans the surrounding device information, it can initiate a connection to a surrounding device, so that you can choose whether to stop scanning the surrounding device information without affecting the connected device Get relevant measurement information.
However, the broadcast scale does not need to connect a certain device because it acquires the broadcast data of the surrounding equipment and then analyzes the related measurement information. Therefore, if the scanning of the surrounding equipment is stopped during the measurement process using the broadcast scale, it means that this measurement data cannot be obtained.

When the device supportUnitChange field is true, it indicates that the device allows modification through the protocol. At this time, you can use this method to modify the unit.
When the method is successfully called, the SDK will send a Bluetooth broadcast signal. When the target device's unit has been modified or the SDK will stop broadcasting after 10s
After this method is called, the operation of the previous synchronization unit will be canceled, for example, the unit of the A device is being synchronized. At this time, when the unit of the B device is synchronized, the SDK will first cancel the synchronization of the unit of the A device, and then start the unit synchronization of the B device.

api/QNConfig.html.title: QNConfig
api/QNConfig.html.body:
QNConfig
SDK configuration object, which controls the scanning behavior, and sets some of the SDK's behavior through it
Attributes



name
Types of
Description




onlyScreenOn
Boolean
Whether to return only the devices that are turned on (bright screen). The default is false, that is, the scales that are turned on and not turned on.


allowDuplicates
Boolean
Whether the same device returns multiple times. Generally speaking, the device will always send Bluetooth broadcasts. The system will callback the same device multiple times during scanning. The SDK will process the same device, so that during a scan, only one device returns. Once, the merchant can set this parameter, and the SDK returns directly every time. Default false (this field is invalid for onBroadcastDeviceDiscover monitoring)


duration
int
Scan duration in ms. The default is 0, that is, scanning is performed unless the APP calls stopBleDeviceDiscovery. When it is not 0, the minimum value is 3000ms, and the scan will automatically stop after a delay of ms. (If there is access to the broadcast scale, please pay attention to the setting of this field, see Broadcast Scale Working Principle)


connectOutTime
long
(Android exclusive) Limited time for connecting the device, unit is ms, the default is 10000, that is, within 10 seconds of calling the connection, if the entire connection process cannot be completed, the connection will be stopped and callback error;When the value is less than or equal to 0, it means no callback;When the value is less than 3000 and greater than 0, it indicates that the timeout is 3000ms. If the connection has been stopped before the connection timed out, there will be no error callback even if the device is not successfully connected during the period.


unit
int
0 is kg, default1 is lb, all scales can support this unit2 is kg, if the scale end does not support, kg will be displayed3 is st, Yingshi, if the scale end does not support, the value of lb, will be displayed


showPowerAlertKey
bool
The default is false. When true, when the SDK is initialized and Bluetooth is turned off, the system will pop up the Bluetooth status. For details, please refer to Apple Developer Documenttation => CoreBluetooth => CBCentralManager =>  Central Manager Initialization Options


setNotCheckGPS
bool
(Android exclusive) The default is false. When true, the SDK will not perform GPS permission judgment when scanning. Continue to scan


enhanceBleBoradcast
bool
Whether the enhanced broadcast scale signal needs to be activated during scanning (not valid for ordinary scales, this option is only for broadcast scales)



unit
The unit displayed on the terminal. If it is not set, the SDK defaults to kg. After setting, it will be saved locally. If there is already a connected device, the unit display on the scale will be updated in real time.

The SDK will always return the value of kg. The APP needs to perform numerical conversion by itself.

attouched_list/faq.html.title: Frequently Asked Questions
attouched_list/faq.html.body:
common problem
How to determine the type of device
At present, the device types are only ordinary Bluetooth scale andBluetooth broadcast scale
After invoking Bluetooth scan, common Bluetooth device will return inonDeviceDiscover, and bluetooth broadcast scale will be called back inonBroadcastDeviceDiscover.

In addition, it can also be simply judged by the Bluetooth name. The body fat scale with the Bluetooth name QN-Scale/QNScale1 is an ordinary Bluetooth scale, and the Bluetooth name with the QN-S3 is a Bluetooth broadcast scale.

What is appid and configuration file？What's the difference？
Appid is the unique identifier created by Qingniu for customers. It will be registered in our back office. A given appid usually does not change. The appid 123456789 in the demo is the appid that we test and let customers experience. The appid's characteristics are unstable and may be modified at any time. If a formal cooperation intention has been reached, it is recommended to apply to us for business or sales appid, the application process is fast, and it can be completed in a few minutes.
The configuration file is some encrypted data used in conjunction with the appid, which specifies the model. algorithm、Indicators and other information. Different customer requirements will be different, so we encapsulate the customer's customized requirements in this configuration file.
Can different clients use the same APPID
Android and iOS can use an appid, applet/applet plug-in cannot be the same as the appid of the SDK for the time being
Is the SDK offline？What data will it send to Light Cow Cloud？
In the method initSdk, the SDK will send a request to verify with our cloud whether the configuration file needs to be updated. If an update is needed, the latest configuration file will be downloaded (the configuration file is small, generally 512 bytes), and if no update is needed, no processing is done.
The SDK supports offline mode. If the customer removes the requirement, we will set the configuration of the item in the configuration file to offline. After being set offline, the SDK no longer sends any network requests (this can be verified with a packet capture tool). The configuration file is no longer updated. If you need to add a model or indicator, you need to apply for a configuration file with our company again, and then the developer Replace manually.
Can you tell if the scale is off?？
For ordinary Bluetooth scale anddual-mode scale, when no device is connected, the device object obtained by scanning QNBleDevice has an attribute isScreenOn, which indicates Whether the screen is bright. After connecting the device, you cannot directly determine whether the device is bright, but for some scales, the connection will be disconnected when the screen is held.

The isScreenOn attribute just indicates that the device is bright at the moment the SDK scans. The screen status of subsequent devices changes, and QNBleDevice does not update dynamically. Need to judge by scanning the new QNBleDevice callback.

For `broadcast scales', the device that can be scanned is the state that it is turned on, but it cannot be scanned, usually it is not turned on.
Missing data returned after measurement
If it is only the weight and BMI data, you can refer to No data such as body fat rate after measurement is completed.
If the body fat rate can be measured, but the indicator you want is missing, the situation is usually not included in the configuration file, you need to communicate with our business/sales to increase the indicator.
After our company increases the indicator, it will resend a configuration file, which needs to be replaced.
Send the model id of the scanned device to our company for confirmation
No data such as body fat rate after measurement

Check if the information is correct, mainly birthday (used to calculate age). Whether the two parameters of height exceed the normal range
Take off your shoes for measurement. When measuring with shoes, the bio-impedance cannot be measured, so indicators such as body fat rate cannot be calculated

What to do if the device cannot be scanned

Check if Bluetooth is turned on. Is there a step on the scale, and whether the mobile phone is too far away from the scale (more than 10 meters)
Check if the scanned device is connected by others
If it is Android, you can check whether you have the positioning permission, and whether you have turned on the location service switch.
Try restarting Bluetooth, no more, try restarting Bluetooth.

Is there a bracelet SDK？
We have smart bracelet devices and SDK. However, the SDK is not completely open to the public for the time being. If you have any intention, you can contact our company for business negotiations.
Is it possible to give calculation methods such as body fat rate?
The algorithms for these indicators belong to my driver secret and cannot be provided.
Initialization prompt appid error

Check if the initialization file and the appid used match
Check if the introduced SDK is up to date

The device has been unsuccessful or disconnected soon after successful

Check if the device is connected by someone else
Check if the currently connected device has been paired in the system Bluetooth. If it is already paired, you need to unpair
Some mobile phones need to scan first to connect successfully, scan the device before connecting

Data or device listen for callbacks, callbacks multiple times at the same time

First determine if multiple monitoring has been set. When listening is not used, it must be set to null
Determine if it is a shoe measurement, this may lead to multiple measurements in a short time

SDK returns no positioning permission error

Check if right ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION with ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION Both have applied, and both permissions have been verified in the SDK
Whether to compile version 26 and above, if yes, both permissions need to be applied separately (new feature of 8.0)
Android 6.0 and above, Google classifies Bluetooth as part of the positioning function. When scanning using Bluetooth, the user needs to authorize the positioning permission. Otherwise, when the scan is invoked, the system will prompt that the positioning permission is required.
A considerable part of the mobile phone (about 1/3 of the way, when the location service switch is not turned on, the device can not be scanned, most of the native is so, and domestic systems will be optimized for this, it is not necessarily



SDK returns the wrong file, confirm that the file location is not abnormal, and confirm that the file is used in the demo without exception

Check if so library is added
Check if the packaged apk file contains so library

What is the storage data on the scale
When an ordinary Bluetooth scale is not connected to a mobile phone during weighing, the scale will store the data in the scale. When the next time it is connected to Bluetooth, it will transfer these data to the APP. Since the SDK cannot identify who the user is, it will send This data is assigned by the APP, and the assigned user can give the SDK to calculate the complete data.
Can you provide Bluetooth protocol
In principle we will not provide Bluetooth protocol, if you really need, you can communicate with our business
Why does the data measured by the SDK differ from the light cow or light cow health data?
We have several sets of algorithms, different algorithms that different devices may use.
In addition, our own APP has a health question mechanism that allows users to answer 2 questions, and uses different algorithms based on the user's answer.
The algorithm mechanism in the SDK is usually a unified algorithm that is immutable. That is to say, the same scale uses our APP to measure and uses the SDK to measure, the calculation data and weight are the same, there may be many differences. Therefore, our company does not recommend using the measurement data of our APP and SDK for comparison. Customers only need to care about whether the algorithm given is appropriate and stable.
How to troubleshoot the Bluetooth version of the online version
First check the user's mobile phone model, if possible, try to use the same model as the customer to test.
Register log output interface QNLogListener, record related logs (can save log files), and send them to our developers for analysis.
Can the SDK only do protocol analysis, Bluetooth scanning and connection are managed by the customer
This is achievable, and the implementation methods of ordinary Bluetooth scales and Bluetooth broadcast scales will be different.

It is technically difficult to implement Bluetooth scanning and connection management by yourself. This operation is not recommended if you have no relevant Bluetooth development experience.

Ordinary Bluetooth Scale

Write your own Bluetooth protocol proxy class to implement each Bluetooth operation method
Write Data Monitor Callback Class QNScaleDataListener and use [QNBleApi.setBleDeviceDiscoveryListener to register in SDK.
Perform the Bluetooth scan by yourself, and pass the relevant information scanned to the SDK, using the method QNBleApi.buildDevice to create a Light Bull Bluetooth device object
Create a user object, using the method QNBleApi.buildUser
Create Bluetooth Protocol Processing Class
Make a Bluetooth connection
The connection is successful. After finding that the service is successful, call the prepare method of the Bluetooth protocol processing class
Process the data of the QNScaleDataListener callback
Handle after receiving stable data.

Bluetooth broadcast scale
When will the Bluetooth of the body fat scale be turned on, and how long will it turn off automatically after turning it on (or disconnect from the mobile phone)
Under normal circumstances, the body fat scale Bluetooth is turned on when the scale is stepped on (that is, the screen is lit), and the radio is transmitted. After the measurement is over, the scale will hold the screen. After the screen is closed, it usually connects for 1-2 minutes (depending on the production batch), and then actively disconnects the measurement. This mechanism is for the user to load the scale again in a short time without having to connect again. If the APP needs to be disconnected immediately after the measurement, it can actively disconnect after a delay of more than 1s after receiving stable data.
API of your official website《Definition of scale status》The status is 0-9. Why is it promising in the demo you provided?“-1”Status (and it does return to this status)
-1 is always present, indicating that the default state is lost, that is, the connection is disconnected. It is usually received after the scale actively disconnects. We will unify this state to the disconnected state as soon as possible.
After searching for Bluetooth and connecting it, keep your feet suspended on the body fat scale for a few seconds, then take your feet away, and return the status code of the measurement completion (there is no data returned in the method of returning data)
Why we can search for Bluetooth without any operation (no one is near the body fat scale within 10-30 minutes)
When weighing, if you connect to the app, the scale will cache this data, and it will broadcast for 5-30 minutes after the screen is closed (depending on the production batch, it varies). After the APP is connected at this time, these cached data can be received and displayed to the customer. This function is used to solve the problem. The user does not need a mobile phone when weighing. After the weighing is completed, he sits on the sofa and turns on the mobile phone to receive the data just now.

flow/ble_scale_custom_connect.html.title: Ordinary Bluetooth scale-self-managed Bluetooth
flow/ble_scale_custom_connect.html.body:
Ordinary Bluetooth scale-self-managed Bluetooth
This chapter is for users who have a certain understanding of Bluetooth and have their own Bluetooth framework in the app.

If you are not familiar with Bluetooth or do not have your own Bluetooth framework, this method is not recommended for access, otherwise it will increase the cost of access



One. Start Bluetooth scan
The customer starts and stops the Bluetooth scan by himself, and sends the scanned device information to our SDK (call QNBleApi.buildDevice). If it is our device, the SDK will Will build QNBleDevice, if it is not our device, it will return null/nil.

Usually the Bluetooth name of our device is QN-Scale or QN-Scale1, and we can usually filter our products by this Bluetooth name.
After the target device is obtained, whether to stop scanning is determined by the APP. We generally recommend stopping Bluetooth scanning before making a connection.

Two. Create a Bluetooth protocol proxy class
Create your own Bluetooth protocol proxy class QNBleProtocolDelegate and implement all its methods. Specific implementation can be our Demo
three. Create Bluetooth protocol processing class
Create Protocol Processing Class QNBleProtocolHandler
four. Connect Bluetooth by yourself
Connected devices using system API or own Bluetooth framework.
The logic of this part is handled by the APP itself
Fives. Discovery Services、Enable eigenvalue
Our scales use two sets of services, one device will only contain one set. The APP needs to traverse all the services to find one set of service IDs, and if one is found, enable the feature values that require callback data according to the feature values in the table below.
After enabling the feature value, call [prepare]of QNBleProtocolHandler and pass the UUID of the service used
The first set
The service ID is: FFE0
Several eigenvalues are used below them, as follows:



UUID
Attributes
Description




FFE1
Notify
Main data callback characteristic values


FFE3
Write
Main data write characteristic value


FFE2
Indicate
The secondary data callback feature value. Note that the attribute is Indicate. The Android enablement may be a little different.


FFE4
Write
Secondary data callback feature


2A19
Read
Charging scale battery characteristic value




The UUID of the characteristic value is only provided in the form of 32 bits. Android needs to use 128 bits.
For example, the 128 bits of FFE0 are: 0000ffe0-0000-1000-8000-00805f9b34fb

Second set
The service ID is: FFF0
There are only two characteristic values below it, one for data callback and one for writing data



UUID
Attributes
Description




FFF1
Notify
Data callback characteristic value


FFF2
Write
Data write characteristic value


2A19
Read
Charging scale battery characteristic value



Data interaction
After enabling the characteristic value, you can receive the data uploaded by the scale.
After the APP receives the callback data from the scale, it sends it to the SDK for analysis through the method QNBleProtocolHandler.onGetBleData, and the parsed data will pass QNScaleDataListener callback.
In addition, if data needs to be written, the app will write on behalf of QNBleProtocolDelegate.writeCharacteristicValue.
Measurement completed
After the measurement is completed, the complete data will be called back through QNScaleDataListener, and then the scale end will actively disconnect the connection.
The next time you connect, you need to re-create QNBleProtocolDelegate and QNBleProtocolHandler

flow/broadcast_scale.html.title: Broadcast scale

flow/broadcast_scale_custom_scan.html.title: Broadcast Scale-Custom Bluetooth Scan
flow/broadcast_scale_custom_scan.html.body:
Broadcast Scale-Custom Bluetooth Scan
This chapter is for users who have a certain understanding of Bluetooth and have their own Bluetooth framework in the app.
During the measurement, the broadcast scale will continuously transmit Bluetooth broadcast signals to the outside, which will contain user weighing information.
The following description is based on the developer's understanding of Bluetooth scanning. If you encounter many problems, it is recommended to use the SDK to scan.
The workflow of the device is approximately as follows:


One. initialization
Use QNBleApi.initSdk for initialization, which has been introduced in the previous article, Please see
Two. scanning
Call Bluetooth scan by yourself

flow/kitchen_scale_custom_scan.html.title: Kitchen Scale-Custom Bluetooth Scan
flow/kitchen_scale_custom_scan.html.body:
Kitchen Scale-Custom Bluetooth Scan
This chapter is for users who have a certain understanding of Bluetooth and have their own Bluetooth framework in the app.
When the kitchen scale is measuring, it will continuously emit a Bluetooth broadcast signal, which will contain weighing information.
The following description is based on the developer's understanding of Bluetooth scanning. If you encounter many problems, it is recommended to use the SDK to scan.
The equipment's workflow is the same as the [broadcast_scale_custom_scan.md]process:
One. initialization
Use QNBleApi.initSdk for initialization, which has been introduced in the previous article, Please see
Two. scanning
Call Bluetooth scan by yourself
After calling the Bluetooth scan, the scanned broadcast information is passed to the SDK, via QNBleApi.buildkitchenDevice
Results processing
After getting QNBleKitchenDevice, please refer to Kitchen Scale Access Flow for the following processing
